issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When packaging a windows module an error is shown is Studio and the CLI. The CLI error is shown below: 

{code:java}
Command
  C:\Users\APPC\AppData\Roaming\nvm\v8.9.1\node.exe C:\Users\APPC\.appcelerator\install\7.1.0-master.24\package\node_modules\titanium\lib\titanium.js build --config-file C:\Users\APPC\AppData\Local\Temp\build-1563539776329.json --log-level info --no-banner --project-dir C:\Users\APPC\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\eight\windows

2019-07-19T12:36:20.844Z | ERROR  | An uncaught exception was thrown!
Assignment to constant variable.
2019-07-19T12:36:20.846Z | ERROR  | Assignment to constant variable.
{code}

Test Steps (CLI): 
# Create a new Windows module
# {{cd}} into the Windows directory
# run {{appc run}}

*Expected result* 
Module should package successfully 

*Actual result*
Above error is shown
fields.summary: [Windows] Error is shown when packaging a windows module
